ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
#IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.earFullDescriptionColour] quickly grows to cover them, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, they're made out of [npc.earFullDescription], #ENDIF and as the transformation finishes, [npc.she] experimentally [npc.verb(feel)] the smooth surface of [npc.her] new ears.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldHyena(naga ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of#IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced,#ENDIF naga ears, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
